title: City of Buffalo joins effort to pressure banks on ‘zombie’ homes
text:
Published By: Buffalow News: City - Today 
Buffalo Comptroller Mark J.F. Schroeder says he’s prepared to pull city funds from banks that allow properties to linger in the foreclosur...
